'''2.4.36''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on April 17, 2023.

== Additions ==
* ''[[Minecraft Legends]]'' is now available in the launcher.

== Changes ==
* Improved the process for launcher updates.

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCL-22245}} - "Learn more" buttons within "Where is the play button!?" messages do not display their full content.
* {{bug|MCL-23013}} - "Play" button for Minecraft Dungeons is not consistently aligned in the launcher.
* {{bug|MCL-23130}} - Minecraft Error message strings displayed within the Launcher are untranslatable.
* {{bug|MCL-23171}} - Minecraft Launcher string used for the GamePassUpsell is missing a colon for the respective game names.
* {{bug|MCL-23172}} - Minecraft Launcher string used for the GamePassUpsell is missing a variable.
* {{bug|MCL-23176}} - The string "Buy now!" within the upsell section for Minecraft Dungeons and Java Edition is untranslatable.</onlyinclude>
